Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Nagaritha Drive, just east of a large intersection.
Room.LongDescription: Natasha's stables are located in the sliver of land created by the strangely shaped Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs northeast to southwest. South of Nagaritha Drive is a small shop. The sign above the door reads "Bysantal's General Goods and Services" in proud, bold lettering. Oceanview Drive is just west of here.
